name: Cristina Correa
bio: Cristina Correa is a VONA/Voices writer, Midwestern Voices & Visions awardee, and has received fellowships from the Indiana University Writers’ Conference and the Ragdale Foundation. Her work has been published or is forthcoming in TriQuarterly, MAKE: A Literary Magazine, Vinyl Poetry, Western Humanities Review, a University of New Mexico Press anthology on Latina/o Poetics, and Best New Poets 2015; broadcast on National Public Radio’s Latino USA; and exhibited at the Museum of Contemporary Art Detroit. She earned a BA in creative writing from Columbia College and an MA in Latin American and Latino Studies from the University of Illinois.
